about_the_game:
Prepare you starship and venture into the Cosmic Rifts, There you will find reincarnated starships infused by the power of the Rift Singularity. Fight your way to the centre of the Rift and close it to seal its fate.


- Beautiful Voxel Art
- Dynamic User Interface
- 25 Unique Bosses with 5 Tiers of difficaulty
- 30+ Starships to collect, purchasable through In-game currency only
- 7 Interstellar Cosmic Rift maps with procedural space debris
- Dynamic radial audio produced by DEFCAT
- In-Game Rating system, with Rating emotes for those who have proven worthly


- Introducing Augments, A fully dynamic system that Augments your Starship with powerful upgrades... Want to command a horde of Orbital Satellites? We got you. Want to create and infinite loop of spawning items that fly towards you? Say no more...
- Unlock Augments by leveling up Co-Pilots, Every 5 Co-Pilot levels unlocks a new Augment, Usable by any other co-pilot!
- Unlock special Augments by completing challenges for the Cosmic Defence Force
- Unlock powerful Augments by Ascending with a Co-Pilot
- Purchace otherworldly Augment from the Black Market that are garrenteed to make you blink twice.


- Montly Rift Events [Each Event contains large changes to Artifacts, Augments or Cosmic Echos]
- Weekly Balance Patches Balancing for Artifacts, Augments and Cosmic Echos]
- Weekly Optimisation Updates Each update icnreases storage optimsation with changes to UI and Gameplay Optimisation


- 100+ Unique Artifacts, Curses and Boons to collect
- Collection log with all your important stats and rewards gained while playing
- Cosmic Compendium that keeps track of everything you need to close a rift
- Co-Pilot progression system that grants you Augments, Satarships and Cosmetics for reaching level milestones

short_description: Cosmos is a rogue-lite shoot-em-up bullet-hell, in which you pilot the last hope for humanity in an attempt to save the world, pitching your augmented Starship against infused cosmic horrors. Can you close the Cosmic Rifts before The Singularity reaches your star system?
